helper-View-Data-razor.description:
ViewData: 
 Gets or sets a dictionary that contains data to pass between the controller and the view.

helper-renderbody-razor.description:
RenderBody: 
 In a Razor layout page, renders the portion of a content page that is not within a named section.

helper-model-view-razor.description:
model: 
 By including a @model statement at the top of the view template file, you can specify the type of object that the view expects.

helper-render-section-razor.description:
RenderSection: 
 In layout pages, reders the content of the section named name.

helper-section-razor.description:
section: 
 Individual views specify the content to be rendered within a section.
